awards.text: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 9 wins & 11 nominations.

fullplot: Based on the true story of a Russian serial killer who, over many years, claimed over 50 victims, mostly under the age of 17. In what was then a Communist state, the police investigations were hampered by bureaucracy, incompetence and those in power. The story is told from the viewpoint of the detective in charge of the case.

title: Citizen X
